soundsbegone.cmd.crowdin.tooltip: Click to open Crowdin translation page
soundsbegone.config.title: Sounds Be Gone Config
soundsbegone.config.telemetry.descriptio: Enabling telemetry will send anonymous data to help us understand how we can make things better. We DO NOT send any data that would identify you.
soundsbegone.config.telemetry.verify: You can check the telemetry code at %s
soundsbegone.config.telemetry.disclaimer: Please consider keeping this on. This data helps development by giving us insight into what is important for the players and what is not
